post_text: Second grade has been learning about ancient Greece, mythology, and Sparta. They enjoyed a presentation today from Mr. Gulledge who talked about the history of the Spartans and the requirements of 7 year old boys to enter a rigorous military training in the Spartan culture. Mr. Gulledge (a.k.a. Odyssey Man), has participated in Spartan races and also shared some pictures of the rigorous training and performance required during these races. Students gasped as he flipped through pictures of the different aspects of the race such as the mud and fire. Odyssey Man, thanks for sharing your knowledge and expertise with our second graders! You brought that ancient culture to life for them today!
